FAQs

Expand All
  • What is the specific procedure for requesting a Fapiao? What types of Fapiaos are there? What are the space limits on a Fapiao?

    Sign in at account.windowsazure.cn, click on Subscribe, Payment History, then Manage Fapiao, then complete the application. For more information see: http://www.21vbluecloud.com/communities/FAQ/fapiao/234.html.

    Fapiaos include both special value-added tax Fapiaos and ordinary value-added tax Fapiaos.

    Regarding Fapiao accounts, the client’s actual name must be used.

  • Can you apply for a Fapiao at any time? Where do you apply for a Fapiao?

    After payment has been made, wait 3 days. After 3 days you can start applying for a Fapiao. Should you have any special requirements, please contact the 21Vianet service center, call 86-10-84563652 or 400-089-0365.

    You can click here to apply directly for an invoice: http://fapiao.cloud.21vianet.com/EmailAcount/LoginView . You can also use the above address to contact someone about applying for an invoice.

    Sign in to the Azure manager interface at: http://account.windowsazure.cn, click on Subscribe, Payment History, then Manage Fapiao.

  • What is the tax rate?

    According to the government, the tax rate for 21Vianet cloud services is 6%.

  • Do I need to provide my license key if I upload my local Windows Server map to Azure?

    No. Microsoft will use the Window Server license key provided by the currently running instance.

  • How do I sign up for a Fapiao interface account? After successfully activating the account, what do I do if I can’t make out a Fapiao?

    After clicking here to enter the Fapiao application interface, you must click the right corner of the page [Register Account] to register the account. On the registration information page, select the product you’ve purchased to register the Azure account.

    If you are unable to open a ticket after activating your account, please contact our 21Vianet service center. Call: 86-10-84563652 or 400-089-0365.

  • After applying for a Fapiao, how do I get the Fapiao? Do I have to pay any extra costs?

    You can get the Fapiao through express delivery or get it yourself. 21Vianet includes the cost of express delivery. You can print and have express delivery through Shanghai Blue Cloud Technology Co., Ltd.

    If you have previously chosen self-service, you can change this to express delivery. The self-service location is: Room 657, Building 3, No. 88 Keyuan Road, Pudong District, Shanghai.
